panels.title: $counters_for  is responsable of Ports: $NP_Port_Range processed by FIA $FIA

targets.rawSql: select router.hostname, interface.if_name, interface.description from interface join router on router.id = router_id where router.hostname like $hostaname
select router.hostname, interface.if_name, interface.description from interface join router on router.id = router_id where router.hostname like $hostaname and interface.if_name like $physical_IF

list.definition: show tag values from asr9k_np_counters with key="node"  where hostname =~ /$hostaname/
list.label: Slot
list.name: Slot
list.query: show tag values from asr9k_np_counters with key="node"  where hostname =~ /$hostaname/

list.definition: show tag values from asr9k_np_counters with key="counters_for"  where("hostname" =~ /$hostaname/ AND "node" =~ /$Slot/)
list.label: NP ID
list.name: counters_for
list.query: show tag values from asr9k_np_counters with key="counters_for"  where("hostname" =~ /$hostaname/ AND "node" =~ /$Slot/)

list.definition: show tag values from asr9k_np_counters with key="counter" where hostname =~ /$hostaname/
list.label: Counter
list.name: counter
list.query: show tag values from asr9k_np_counters with key="counter" where hostname =~ /$hostaname/

list.definition: show tag values with key = "if_name" where "hostname" =~ /$hostaname/
list.label: Phisycal Interface
list.name: physical_IF
list.query: show tag values with key = "if_name" where "hostname" =~ /$hostaname/

list.definition: show tag values from asr9k_np_counters with key="ports" where ("hostname" =~ /$hostaname/ AND "node" =~ /^$Slot$/ AND "counters_for" =~ /^$counters_for$/)
list.name: NP_Port_Range
list.query: show tag values from asr9k_np_counters with key="ports" where ("hostname" =~ /$hostaname/ AND "node" =~ /^$Slot$/ AND "counters_for" =~ /^$counters_for$/)

list.definition: show tag values from asr9k_np_counters with key="fia" where ("hostname" =~ /$hostaname/ AND "node" =~ /^$Slot$/ AND "counters_for" =~ /^$counters_for$/)
list.label: FIA_ID
list.name: FIA
list.query: show tag values from asr9k_np_counters with key="fia" where ("hostname" =~ /$hostaname/ AND "node" =~ /^$Slot$/ AND "counters_for" =~ /^$counters_for$/)
